thread.section_title: SmartBuyGlasses Canada Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SmartBuyGlasses Canada | smartbuyglasses.ca
thread.title: Daniel

author: Daniel
title: Daniel
text:
Would be a 5 star and should be - just keeping it real. Service from this company is A1. Product was also excellent, except for a small defect and the fact they forgot to put the anti-reflection coating inside lenses.
I contacted them and right away they arranged for me to send back for a replacement. OK, this is not perfect, but hey, stuff happens to everybody, so I excuse this as action is good and responsive. They paid the return postage and will send back new glasses. This just happened, so I am in the process and should receive them next week. If all is ok, you wont see any follow-up to this and I will maintain my 4 star going on 5! Recommende these guys. Good business.
